com.helger.schematron.svrl

Class SVRLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helger.schematron.svrl.SVRLHelper

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class SVRLHelper
extends Object
    Miscellaneous utility methods for handling Schematron output (SVRL).
    Author:
    Philip Helger

      • getAllFailedAssertions

        @Nonnull
 @ReturnsMutableCopy
public static com.helger.commons.collection.ext.ICommonsList<SVRLFailedAssert> getAllFailedAssertions(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                                      SchematronOutputType aSchematronOutput)
        Get a list of all failed assertions in a given schematron output.
        Parameters:
        aSchematronOutput - The schematron output to be used. May not be null.
        Returns:
        A non-null list with all failed assertions.

        aSchematronOutput - The schematron output to be used. May not be null.
